  <description>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radio and TV signals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radio und Fernsehapparat Signale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Radio et signaux de TV</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rádio e sinais da tevê</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radio e segnali della TV</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σήματα ραδιοφώνων και TV</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radio y señales de la TV</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the transmission of UHF and VHF signals from TV and radio transmitters.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio transmitter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">TV transmitter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrahigh frequency signal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">very high frequency signal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Übertragung der UHF- 
und VHF Signale von Fernsehapparat und von den Radioübermittlern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la transmission des 
signaux de fréquence ultra-haute et de VHF de TV et d'émetteurs par 
radio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a transmissão de sinais 
da frequência ultraelevada e do VHF da tevê e dos transmissores de 
rádio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la trasmissione dei 
segnali di VHF e di frequenza ultraelevata dalla TV e dalle 
radiotrasmittenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη μετάδοση των σημάτων 
UHF και VHF από την TV και τις ραδιο συσκευές αποστολής 
σημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la transmisión de las 
señales de la frecuencia ultraelevada y del VHF de la TV y de los 
radiotransmisores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioübermittler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fernsehapparat Übermittler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultrahochfrequenzsignal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sehr Hochfrequenzsignal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlänge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">émetteur par radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Émetteur de TV</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">signal ultra-haut de fréquence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">signal très à haute fréquence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueur d'onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transmissor de rádio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transmissor da tevê</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sinal ultrahigh da freqüência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sinal muito de alta freqüência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radiotrasmittente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasmettitore della TV</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">segnale ultraelevato di frequenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">segnale molto ad alta frequenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezza d'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ραδιο συσκευή αποστολής σημάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συσκευή αποστολής σημάτων TV</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπερβολικα υψηλός σήμα συχνότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολύ σήμα υψηλής συχνότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μήκος κύματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">radiotransmisor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transmisor de la TV</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">señal ultraalta de la frecuencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">señal muy de alta frecuencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitud de onda</string>
          </keyword>
